title: Carnatic Classical: Millennium - The Finest Collection - 8 CD co
description:
Carnatic Classical: Millennium - The Finest Collection - 8 CD compilation (192 - 320 kbps) 

A 8 CD compilation. Virtually every major vocalist and instrumentalist is represented in this anthology. 

Listing:
